item.title: Unsupervised Learning: SVM
item.description: SVM is calculating a hyperplane to separate the data points into groups according to the label. Hyperplane A hyperplane is defined to be of the following form $$ \begin{equation} \boldsymbol{\beta} \cdot \mathbf x = \beta_0. \end{equation} $$ where $\boldsymbol\beta$ is the normal vector to the plane and is required to be constant.
